trans-unit.source: Prerequisites to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Server Installation

target.mrk: Prérequis à l'installation du serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: Before installing a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server:

seg-source.mrk: Before installing a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server:

target.mrk: Avant l'installation du serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> :

trans-unit.source: Check the following prerequisites (<MadCap:xref href="#Prerequisites_to_Lina_server_installation" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Check the following prerequisites (<MadCap:xref href="#Prerequisites_to_Lina_server_installation" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

target.mrk: Vérifiez les prérequis suivants (<MadCap:xref href="#Prerequisites_to_Lina_server_installation" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Refer to the Compatibility Guide to verify the list of supported operating systems for the server.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to the Compatibility Guide to verify the list of supported operating systems for the server.

target.mrk: Référez-vous au Guide de compatibilité pour vérifier la liste des systèmes d'exploitation pris en charge pour le serveur .

target.mrk: Conditions préalables

trans-unit.source: Hardware/Processor

seg-source.mrk: Hardware/Processor

target.mrk: Matériel/Processeur

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server must be installed:

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server must be installed:

target.mrk: Vous devez installer le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> :

trans-unit.source: On a machine with a multi-core 64-bit processor.

seg-source.mrk: On a machine with a multi-core 64-bit processor.

target.mrk: Sur une machine dotée d’un processeur multicœur 64 bits.

trans-unit.source: On a local and dedicated fast access disk, such as an SSD.

seg-source.mrk: On a local and dedicated fast access disk, such as an SSD.

target.mrk: Sur un disque d’accès rapide local et dédié, tel qu’un SSD.

trans-unit.source: Operating System

seg-source.mrk: Operating System

target.mrk: Système d’exploitation

trans-unit.source: To find out the list of supported Operating Systems, see the Compatibility Guide.

seg-source.mrk: To find out the list of supported Operating Systems, see the Compatibility Guide.

target.mrk: Pour connaître la liste des systèmes d’exploitation pris en charge, consultez le Guide de compatibilité .

trans-unit.source: Linux Server

seg-source.mrk: Linux Server

target.mrk: Serveurs Linux

trans-unit.source: Some packages must be installed before running the installer.

seg-source.mrk: Some packages must be installed before running the installer.

target.mrk: Certains packages doivent être installés avant d’exécuter le programme d’installation.

trans-unit.source: For an installation in CLI using the silent mode, run the following commands to install the required packages:

seg-source.mrk: For an installation in CLI using the silent mode, run the following commands to install the required packages:

target.mrk: Pour une installation en ligne de commande utilisant le mode silencieux, exécutez les commandes suivantes pour installer les packages nécessaires :

trans-unit.source: Debian-based distributions: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libaio1 libcrypt libavahi-client3 lsb-core

seg-source.mrk: Debian-based distributions: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libaio1 libcrypt libavahi-client3 lsb-core

target.mrk: Distributions basées sur Debian : apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libaio1 libcrypt libavahi-client3 lsb-core

trans-unit.source: RPM-based distributions: yum update && yum install libaio libcrypt avahi-libs

seg-source.mrk: RPM-based distributions: yum update && yum install libaio libcrypt avahi-libs

target.mrk: Distributions basées sur RPM : yum update && yum install libaio libcrypt avahi-libs

trans-unit.source: For an installation in graphical mode, run the following commands to install the required packages:

seg-source.mrk: For an installation in graphical mode, run the following commands to install the required packages:

target.mrk: Pour une installation en mode graphique, exécutez les commandes suivantes pour installer les packages requis :

trans-unit.source: Debian-based distributions: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libaio1 libcrypt libavahi-client3 lsb-core libxext6 libxtst6 libxrender1 fonts-dejavu

seg-source.mrk: Debian-based distributions: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libaio1 libcrypt libavahi-client3 lsb-core libxext6 libxtst6 libxrender1 fonts-dejavu

target.mrk: Distributions basées sur Debian : apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libaio1 libcrypt libavahi-client3 lsb-core libxext6 libxtst6 libxrender1 fonts-dejavu

trans-unit.source: RPM-based distributions: yum update && yum install libaio libcrypt avahi-libs libXext libXtst libXrender dejavu-sans-fonts dejavu-serif-fonts

seg-source.mrk: RPM-based distributions: yum update && yum install libaio libcrypt avahi-libs libXext libXtst libXrender dejavu-sans-fonts dejavu-serif-fonts

target.mrk: Distributions basées sur RPM : yum update && yum install libaio libcrypt avahi-libs libXext libXtst libXrender dejavu-sans-fonts dejavu-serif-fonts.

trans-unit.source: To use the graphical environment of a remote host during an installation in graphical mode, one of the following items must be used:

seg-source.mrk: To use the graphical environment of a remote host during an installation in graphical mode, one of the following items must be used:

target.mrk: Pour utiliser l’environnement graphique d’un hôte distant lors d’une installation en mode graphique, vous devez utiliser l’un des éléments suivants :

trans-unit.source: A graphical environment (X Windows) on the local host.

seg-source.mrk: A graphical environment (X Windows) on the local host.

target.mrk: Un environnement graphique (X Windows) sur l'hôte distant.

trans-unit.source: A DISPLAY variable set .

seg-source.mrk: A DISPLAY variable set .

target.mrk: Une variable DISPLAY définie.

trans-unit.source: Linux Server Snapshot

seg-source.mrk: Linux Server Snapshot

target.mrk: Snapshot du serveur Linux

trans-unit.source: If you intend to use snapshots to secure your Linux Server, all your ADE components must be stored on:

seg-source.mrk: If you intend to use snapshots to secure your Linux Server, all your ADE components must be stored on:

target.mrk: Si vous voulez utiliser les snapshots pour sécuriser votre serveur Linux, tous vos composants doivent être stockés sur :

trans-unit.source: Version 2.02.95 or higher of LVM2

seg-source.mrk: Version 2.02.95 or higher of LVM2

target.mrk: La version 2.02.95 ou supérieure de LVM2

trans-unit.source: Thinly-Provisioned Logical Volumes (thin volumes)

seg-source.mrk: Thinly-Provisioned Logical Volumes (thin volumes)

target.mrk: Des volumes logiques à allocation fine

trans-unit.source: For more details on how to create a thin volume, see <MadCap:xref href="Create_Thin_Volume_Linux.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create a Thin Volume on Linux</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more details on how to create a thin volume, see <MadCap:xref href="Create_Thin_Volume_Linux.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create a Thin Volume on Linux</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Pour plus de détails sur la façon de créer un thin volume, voir <MadCap:xref href="Create_Thin_Volume_Linux.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create a Thin Volume on Linux</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Windows Server Snapshot

seg-source.mrk: Windows Server Snapshot

target.mrk: Snapshot du serveur Windows

trans-unit.source: If you intend to use snapshots to secure your Windows Server, store all your ADE components on an NTFS file system.

seg-source.mrk: If you intend to use snapshots to secure your Windows Server, store all your ADE components on an NTFS file system.

target.mrk: Si vous avez l’intention d’utiliser des snapshots pour sécuriser votre serveur Windows, stockez tous vos composants ADE sur un système de fichiers NTFS.

trans-unit.source: If you intend to use the snapshot revert feature, do not install any ADE components on the system disk.

seg-source.mrk: If you intend to use the snapshot revert feature, do not install any ADE components on the system disk.

target.mrk: Si vous voulez utiliser la fonctionnalité de restauration d’un snapshot, n’installez aucun composant ADE sur le disque système.

alt-trans.seg-source: In addition, if you want to use the snapshot revert feature, do not install any ADE components on the system disk.
alt-trans.target: De plus, si vous voulez utiliser la fonctionnalité snapshot revert, n’installez aucun composant ADE sur le disque système.

trans-unit.source: File system

seg-source.mrk: File system

target.mrk: Système de fichiers

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to use:

seg-source.mrk: It is recommended to use:

target.mrk: Il est recommandé d'utiliser :

trans-unit.source: An ext4 file system on Linux servers

seg-source.mrk: An ext4 file system on Linux servers

target.mrk: Un système de fichiers ext4 sur les serveurs Linux

trans-unit.source: An NTFS on Windows servers.

seg-source.mrk: An NTFS on Windows servers.

target.mrk: Un NTFS sur les serveurs Windows.

trans-unit.source: Memory

seg-source.mrk: Memory

target.mrk: Mémoire

trans-unit.source: At least 8 GB of RAM is required.

seg-source.mrk: At least 8 GB of RAM is required.

target.mrk: Un minimum de 8 Go de RAM est nécessaire.

trans-unit.source: Repository

seg-source.mrk: Repository

target.mrk: Répertoire de stockage

trans-unit.source: At least 32 GB of disk space must be permanently available on the volume where the Atempo-Deduplication Engine data blocks are stored.

seg-source.mrk: At least 32 GB of disk space must be permanently available on the volume where the Atempo-Deduplication Engine data blocks are stored.

target.mrk: Un minimum de 32 Go d’espace disque doit être disponible en permanence sur le volume où sont stockés les blocs de données Atempo Deduplication Engine.

trans-unit.source: Directory of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server Database

seg-source.mrk: Directory of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server Database

target.mrk: Répertoire de la base de données du serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: At least 10 GB of disk space must be permanently available on the volume where the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> data is stored.

seg-source.mrk: At least 10 GB of disk space must be permanently available on the volume where the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> data is stored.

target.mrk: Au moins 10 Go d'espace disque doivent être disponibles en permanence sur le volume où les données <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sont stockées.

trans-unit.source: Default Communication Ports

seg-source.mrk: Default Communication Ports

target.mrk: Ports de communication par défaut

trans-unit.source: These ports are the default ports and must be open on your firewall (unless you choose other values when you run the setup):

seg-source.mrk: These ports are the default ports and must be open on your firewall (unless you choose other values when you run the setup):

target.mrk: Les ports suivants sont les ports par défaut et doivent être ouverts dans votre pare-feu (sauf si vous choisissez d’autres numéros de port pendant l’installation) :

trans-unit.source: 8181: Communication port for .

seg-source.mrk: 8181: Communication port for .

target.mrk: 8181 : port de communication pour la .

trans-unit.source: 23232: Communication port for Atempo-Deduplication Engine.

seg-source.mrk: 23232: Communication port for Atempo-Deduplication Engine.

target.mrk: 23232 : Port de communication pour le moteur de déduplication Atempo (ADE).

trans-unit.source: Proxy option in web browser

seg-source.mrk: Proxy option in web browser

target.mrk: Option proxy du navigateur web

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your web browser does not use a proxy. Otherwise, you may get this error message when trying to access your server in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />: "Attempt to load data from a server outside the security sandbox".

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that your web browser does not use a proxy.

Otherwise, you may get this error message when trying to access your server in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />: "Attempt to load data from a server outside the security sandbox".

target.mrk: Assurez-vous que votre navigateur web n’utilise pas de proxy.

Sinon, vous risquez d'obtenir ce message d'erreur lorsque vous essayez d'accéder à votre serveur dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />: "Attempt to load data from a server outside the security sandbox".

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, follow these instructions:

seg-source.mrk: To avoid this problem, follow these instructions:

target.mrk: Pour éviter ce problème, suivez ces instructions :

trans-unit.source: Mozilla Firefox: Open the Application Menu > Settings > Network Settings. In the Connection Settings window, select the No Proxy check box.

seg-source.mrk: Mozilla Firefox: Open the Application Menu > Settings > Network Settings.
In the Connection Settings window, select the No Proxy check box.

target.mrk: Mozilla Firefox : Ouvrez le menu de l'application > Paramètres > Paramètres réseau.
Dans la fenêtre Paramètres de connexion, cochez la case Pas de Proxy.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Internet Explorer: Open Tools > Internet Options > Connections > LAN Settings. In the Local Area Network (LAN) Settings window, ensure that the Use a proxy server for your LAN option is unchecked.

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Internet Explorer: Open Tools > Internet Options > Connections > LAN Settings.
In the Local Area Network (LAN) Settings window, ensure that the Use a proxy server for your LAN option is unchecked.

target.mrk: Microsoft Internet Explorer : ouvrez Outils > Options Internet > Connexions > Paramètres LAN.
Dans la fenêtre Paramètres du réseau local (LAN), assurez-vous que l’option Utiliser un serveur proxy pour votre réseau local est décochée.

trans-unit.source: Google Chrome: Open the menu, then click Settings > Advanced > Open proxy settings. In the Proxy window, ensure that the Use a proxy server option is unchecked.

seg-source.mrk: Google Chrome: Open the menu, then click Settings > Advanced > Open proxy settings.
In the Proxy window, ensure that the Use a proxy server option is unchecked.

target.mrk: Google Chrome : ouvrez le menu, puis cliquez sur Paramètres > Avancé > Ouvrir les paramètres du proxy.
Dans la fenêtre Proxy, assurez-vous que l'option Utiliser un serveur proxy est décochée.

trans-unit.source: Apple Safari: Open Safari > Preferences > Advanced tab > Change Settings.... Ensure that no proxies are used.

seg-source.mrk: Apple Safari: Open Safari > Preferences > Advanced tab > Change Settings....
Ensure that no proxies are used.

target.mrk: Apple Safari : ouvrez Safari > Préférences > onglet Avancé > Modifier les paramètres....
Assurez-vous qu'aucun proxy n'est utilisé.

trans-unit.source: Language

seg-source.mrk: Language

target.mrk: Langue

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> adopts the language set at the operating system level. Available languages are English and French.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> adopts the language set at the operating system level.
Available languages are English and French.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> adopte la langue définie au niveau du système d'exploitation.
Les langues disponibles sont l’anglais et le français.

trans-unit.source: User

seg-source.mrk: User

target.mrk: Droits requis

trans-unit.source: The user launching the setup program must have administrator or root rights.

seg-source.mrk: The user launching the setup program must have administrator or root rights.

target.mrk: L’utilisateur qui lance le programme d’installation doit avoir des droits d’administrateur ou root.

alt-trans.seg-source: The user launching the setup program must have administrator/root rights.
alt-trans.target: L’utilisateur qui lance le programme d’installation doit avoir les permissions d’administrateur/root.

trans-unit.source: During the installation or upgrade, the setup verifies that prerequisites are met. If your environment does not meet some of them, you may encounter one of the following cases:

seg-source.mrk: During the installation or upgrade, the setup verifies that prerequisites are met.
If your environment does not meet some of them, you may encounter one of the following cases:

target.mrk: Lors de l’installation ou la mise à jour, le programme d’installation vérifie si les conditions préalables sont remplies.
Si votre environnement ne répond pas à certains prérequis, vous risquez de rencontrer l'un des cas suivants :

alt-trans.seg-source: If your environment does not meet some of the prerequisites, either:
alt-trans.target: Si votre environnement ne remplit pas certaines des conditions préalables, soit :

alt-trans.seg-source: If your environment does not meet some of the prerequisites, either:
alt-trans.target: Si votre environnement ne remplit pas certaines des conditions préalables, soit :

alt-trans.seg-source: If your environment does not meet some of the prerequisites, either:
alt-trans.target: Si votre environnement ne remplit pas certaines des conditions préalables, soit :

alt-trans.seg-source: If your environment does not meet some of the prerequisites, either:
alt-trans.target: Si votre environnement ne remplit pas certaines des conditions préalables, soit :

alt-trans.seg-source: If your environment does not meet some of the prerequisites, either:
alt-trans.target: Si votre environnement ne remplit pas certaines des conditions préalables, soit :

trans-unit.source: A warning message specifies which requirement is not met, as well as recommendations on the corrective measures to take to comply with the requirements.

seg-source.mrk: A warning message specifies which requirement is not met, as well as recommendations on the corrective measures to take to comply with the requirements.

target.mrk: Un message d'avertissement précise quel prérequis n'est pas rempli, ainsi que des recommandations sur les mesures correctives à prendre pour se conformer aux exigences.

trans-unit.source: The installation stops until you make the necessary changes to meet the prerequisites.

seg-source.mrk: The installation stops until you make the necessary changes to meet the prerequisites.

target.mrk: L’installation s’arrête pour vous permettre d’effectuer les modifications nécessaires.

alt-trans.seg-source: the installation stops until you make the necessary changes to meet the prerequisites.
alt-trans.target: l’installation s’arrêtera pour vous permettre d’effectuer les modifications nécessaires.
